tipText:
header <h1>
There should only be one <h1> tag on a page

.nav-pills li:nth-child(2)
You can use any jQuery or CSS designator to spotlight.

<button class="startspotlighter">

Spotlighter scrolls up and down as needed

#element by id
Oh, and don't scroll too much up and down — your visitor may become dizzy...

HTML tags
Be sure to use < and > if you want to write visible HTML tags. And use ' and " to write visible quotation marks

.element by class name
Can be done, but make sure there is only one element with that class name!
